events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product shipment.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong product delivery.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I’ve attached a picture showing the incorrect item delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and refund processing. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been successfully processed. Please allow a few business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since your refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
